# jsonRepresentation()

**Instance Method**

Returns the contents of the metric in JSON format.

## Declaration

```swift
func jsonRepresentation() -> Data
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/Data] (Swift) or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] (Objective-C) object containing the JSON representation of the contents of the metric.

## Generate a report

- **dictionaryRepresentation()**: Returns the contents of a metric as a dictionary.
